name: Recover!
description:
Game for Mini Jam, Island Theme.

Controls: W: Jump, A: Left, D: Right,  Q: Attack. Or Arrow Keys for movement.

Wipe out the goblins from the island! 

Development in process, developed in Ct.js

Enjoy! #StayHome
